posts.post_content:
Thanks to everyone for all the help and offers, especially Larry, Greg, Marc, Doug and Ed for helping me find the last ten cards I needed to reach 518.  All the cards are on their way or have arrived safely.


Brian
Great accomplishment! Good luck with the final 10!
Thank you to everyone for their replies to date.  I've already been able to find three cards I needed.  If anyone has any of the remaining seven cards I need for sale, please let me know.

Congrats on having the finish line in view!!  
That's gotta feel real REAL good!
Down from 10 to 4 since Friday.  Still need three Southern Leaguers and Merkle (Throwing).  If anyone has one they'd be willing to part with, please let me know.
